kesako.server

Class ServerCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • kesako.server.ServerCommand

  • public class ServerCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    Object that allow to execute a shell command.
    The object is built from a XML node that describes the command to execute.
    The class implements the Log4J logging system.
    Author:
    Frederic SACHOT

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerCommand

        public ServerCommand(org.w3c.dom.Node n)
        Construction of the object.
        Parameters:
        n - XML node which contains the command to be executed:(example of the HSQLDB server)
        < server >
        < name >HSQLDB< /name >
        < description >Start the SQL Server< /description >
        < workDir >../SQL< /workDir >
        < command >java -cp hsqldb.jar org.hsqldb.Server< /command >
        < /server >
